entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
